definition: clear and bright/unclouded/clear and sonorous (voice)/clear and lively (narrative)
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: My wet eyes felt warm in the brisk autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛不觉在秋季清朗的风中湿润发热。

sentences.english: I saw the sun out of a clear azure sky.
sentences.chinese: 我看见太阳照耀在清朗的天空中。

sentences.english: The sky happen to time it crystal clearly blue.
Some voices are clear, others are more scratchy.
sentences.chinese: 有的很清朗，其他的更沙哑。

sentences.english: He that sends the clouds can as easily clear the skies.
sentences.chinese: 祂能将黑云密布天空，祂也能很容易地使天气清朗。

sentences.english: The sun shone out of a clear azure sky.
sentences.chinese: 清朗蔚蓝的天空中阳光明媚。

sentences.english: At midnight the sky became clearer and the stars grew brighter.
sentences.chinese: 半夜里，天空变得清朗了，星星更亮了。

definition: simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
